description:
Kuroiwa Iwao is a Special Class http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator] and an Investigation Commander in Division I. He served as the Vice Commander of the 11th Ward Special Countermeasures Unit, and Vice Commander of Squad 1 during the Owl Suppression Operation. He was seriously wounded during the battle, losing his left hand. Even so, he has managed to continue serving as an investigator and was greatly admired for his charisma. http://anidb.net/ch69927 [Shinohara Yukinori] used to call him by the nickname Iwaccho.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Kuroiwa Iwao
